query: I dont know why I feel so anxious even when nothing is wrong.

results.document: I’m still scared, but less alone.
results.ai_response: Reduced isolation significantly improves emotional tolerance.

results.document: I worry they’ll think my problems aren’t serious enough.
results.ai_response: Every feeling that weighs on you is valid. Therapy isn’t only for crises — it’s for building understanding and tools before things worsen.
Vulnerability often follows honesty. We stabilize after.

results.document: I’m still scared about the future though. Everything feels uncertain.
results.ai_response: Fear of the unknown is universal. When the future feels heavy, grounding in the present — even by naming one thing you control today — can ease that tension.

results.document: I don’t know how to stop suppressing.
results.ai_response: We don’t force it. We create safety and permission in small, tolerable doses.
